name: First Adventure
description:
NOTE:     This game is currently in-development!
Currently this is an Early Access version.

You are a hunter who loves to explore dungeons in search of treasures with the help of your partner, but she disappeared! She left suddenly, it looks like she was mad at you, but you don't know why.

CONTROLS:

X = attack

Z = roll

C = interact

Arrows = Movement

Arrows + X 3x = Combo

Developed by Scape Games and published by Angel Star Studios.
